name: Sonic Wind
description:
Its a Sonic RPG fan game, If you like Sonic Rpg and Final Fantasy Sonic x try this game.

I tried hard to give you a great sonic fan game or good at least.

The game will be playable on pc & android (the android version will take a long time to import it).

Sonic and related characters are © SEGA

The game is still in development..

So you will see glitches and bugs.

If you noise one glitch or bug then tell us.

Install instructions Right click Sonic Wind 1.0.7.zip, extract here. Sonic Wind Demo 1.0.7 (Repairs)

(After the cutscene fade to white press Enter) [Fixed]

(Healing does not appear) [Fixed]

(SpinDashing does not appear after charging) [Fixed]

(After skipping the cutscene the music doesn't stop) [Fixed]

(Loading tips changed)
